Package com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.table

Interface Summary
DataProvider  
HasChunks

Class Summary
AbstractTableWidget  
BoundTable This is an option-rich table for use with objects implementing the Bindable interfaces.
Field  
GridForm  
OptionTable This table is a simple extension of the BoundTable, but it changes the names of the "selected" and "value" properties to "value" and "options" respectively.
